ValidationRule.description: Before moving to Project Status "In implementation" the following mandatory fields must be filled: Name, Programme Location, Planned Implementation Start Date, Transition Project Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(Programme_Location__c), ISBLANK(Planned_Implementation_Start_Date__c), ISPICKVAL(Transition_Project_Type__c , '') ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Transition', OR( ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Closure') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory fields missing before moving to Project Status "In Implementation": â€‹Name, Programme Location, Planned Implementation Start Date, Transition Project Type.
